## piixel package

Control WS281X LEDs from a Raspberry Pi using TypeScript / Node.js

## Enumerations

|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [StripType](./piixel.striptype.md) | LED strip type identifiers See [https://github.com/jgarff/rpi\_ws281x/blob/master/ws2811.h\#L46](https://github.com/jgarff/rpi_ws281x/blob/master/ws2811.h#L46) |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [colorwheel(pos)](./piixel.colorwheel.md) | <p>Returns the colorwheel RGB value as an integer/hex value for the given number</p><p>Based on C implementation from [https://github.com/adafruit/circuitpython/blob/main/shared-module/rainbowio/\_\_init\_\_.c](https://github.com/adafruit/circuitpython/blob/main/shared-module/rainbowio/__init__.c)</p> |
|  [rgb2hex(r, g, b)](./piixel.rgb2hex.md) | Convert RGB color (e.g. 255, 255, 255) to HEX number |
